name: Mifare 1k
description: A widely used contactless smart card with 1KB memory, ideal for access control, attendance, and transit applications.

name: Mifare 4k
description: A higher-capacity Mifare card offering more memory for advanced access control and multi-application use.

name: RFID Thick Card
description: A durable RFID card with increased thickness, designed for rugged use and long-term performance.

name: RFID Card
description: A standard contactless card used for access control, identification, and automation systems.

name: NFC 213 Card
description: An NFC-enabled card suitable for authentication, digital sharing, and mobile-based NFC applications.

name: 13.56MHz White Smart Card
description: A blank HF smart card operating at 13.56MHz, ready for printing and encoding in secure systems.

name: Proximity Card
description: A contactless card that works with proximity readers for quick and secure access control.

name: NFC Card
description: A versatile contactless card compatible with smartphones and NFC readers for tap-and-go usage.

name: RFID Card w/o Number
description: An unnumbered RFID card ideal for clean branding, custom printing, or backend-based identification.

name: UHF Card
description: A long-range RFID card designed for vehicle access, asset tracking, and logistics applications.

name: RFID Chip Card
description: A contactless card with an embedded chip for secure data storage and controlled access.

name: Chip Card
description: A smart card with an integrated chip used for secure identification and data protection.

name: Sticky Card
description: An adhesive-backed card that can be attached to existing cards, badges, or surfaces.

name: PVC Card
description: A standard plastic card used for ID cards, memberships, and general-purpose printing.

name: NFC 216 Glossy Card
description: A high-memory NFC card with a glossy finish, suitable for premium branding and digital interactions.

name: NFC Matt Finish Card
description: An NFC card with a matte surface, ideal for reduced glare and professional-looking prints.

name: Metal Card
description: A premium metal card offering high durability and a distinctive, high-end appearance.

name: Printed Card
description: A ready-to-use card with custom graphics, logos, or variable data already printed.

name: Magnetic Card
description: A card with a magnetic stripe used for swipe-based access, payment, or identification systems.

name: Mifare Printed Card
description: A pre-printed Mifare smart card combining secure contactless technology with custom branding.

name: 125KHz Card
description: A low-frequency proximity card commonly used in basic access control systems.

name: NFC Printed Card
description: A printed NFC card designed for branding, access, or smart marketing applications.

name: NXP Printed Card
description: A smart card using NXP chips, printed and ready for secure identification or access use.

name: NXP Ntag Card
description: An NFC smart card powered by NXP NTAG chips, ideal for smartphone interaction and digital content sharing.

name: ID Card Lanyard
description: Durable and comfortable lanyards designed for secure ID badge carrying. Ideal for corporate offices, events, schools, and secure facilities.

name: ID Card Holder
description: Protective card holders that keep ID badges safe from damage while ensuring clear visibility. Available in multiple orientations and materials.

name: ID Card Software
description: Professional card design and management software for creating, encoding, and printing secure ID credentials with ease and precision.

name: NTAG Label
description: High-performance NFC labels ideal for smart identification, access control, and asset tracking applications with reliable read/write capability.

name: UHF Wet Inlay 9662
description: Long-range UHF RFID inlay designed for asset tracking, inventory management, and supply chain applications with excellent read performance.

name: UHF Reader Label
description: RFID-enabled labels optimized for use with UHF readers, enabling fast and accurate tracking of assets and inventory.

name: 4k Prelam
description: High-frequency 4K RFID pre-laminated inlay used in smart cards for secure access control, campus IDs, and contactless authentication systems.
